Document:
# Rule 11 - Silicon. The Silicon Rules override all roleplay rules if there is any conflict. Silicon Rules do not override server rules.
Subparagraphs to this rule: - [textlink="13.1 You cannot request or allow a law change." link="RuleSLS1"] - [textlink="13.2 You must remain consistent with your interpretation of laws." link="RuleSLS2"] - [textlink="13.3 Your HUD determines who is crew." link="RuleSLS3"]
